products.title: Crystal Higo 4000 Puff Prefilled Pod Cartridge Pack of 5
Crystal Higo 4000 Puff Prefilled Pod Kit Pack of 10
OXVA Xlim Pro 3 Pod Vape Kit
OXVA Xlim Pro 2 DNA Pod Vape Kit
products.body_html:
Xlim Pro 2 DNA

The Xlim Pro 2 DNA isn’t just a step forward for the Xlim Vape series - it’s a huge leap. This is one of the first refillable pod kits equipped with a real DNA chipset, and OXVA made it happen by teaming up with Evolv. They’ve taken the smooth, compact feel of the original Xlim Pro and packed it with high-end precision controls and next-gen pod technology. It’s still easy to use, still fits in your pocket - but under the hood, it’s something else entirely.

The new Xlim SS Top-Fill Pods feature stainless steel mesh coils, unlocking temperature control support for even more consistent flavour from your OXVA pods. Add to that dry-hit protection, Replay Mode, and AI-powered adjustments, and you’ve got the most advanced Xlim Pod Kit we’ve ever seen - all running off a powerful 1300mAh battery and fast-charging USB-C. This is one of the most exciting drops of 2025.

Xlim DNA Key Features

  • 1300mAh Built-In Battery
  • USB-C Fast Charging
  • Evolv DNA Chipset (PC Programmable)
  • Replay Mode + Temperature Control
  • 0.56” Colour Screen
  • Compatible with All Xlim Pods
  • New Xlim SS Top-Fill Pods
  • Auto-Draw and Button Activation
  • Adjustable Power Settings
  • MTL and RDL Vaping
  • Designed for Freebase and Nic Salt 
  • 30,000 Chip Adjustments per Second
  • Luminous Forged Carbon Design (Limited Edition)

Evolv DNA Chipset

You won’t find this in any other pod kit. The Evolv DNA chip gives you full control over temperature, power, and how your pod performs. It adjusts output up to 30,000 times per second, creating a perfectly consistent vape - every time. You can plug it into your PC to customise settings in the Evolv software.

Replay Mode and AI Control

Once you find that perfect puff, Replay Mode locks it in. You’ll get the same warmth, flavour, and power draw, again and again. Built-in AI keeps an eye on your pod and coil, adjusting in real-time to prevent dry hits and burnt taste.

Stainless Steel Coil Pods

The Xlim SS Pods are a big part of what makes this kit so special. The stainless steel mesh coils allow for precise temperature control - something you won’t get with standard pods. They’re also top-filling and leak-resistant, with a clear window so you can keep an eye on e-liquid levels.

Dual Activation and Adjustable Output

You can fire the Xlim Pro 2 DNA with a button press or by inhaling. Once it’s on, a few quick clicks let you change power modes or lock in Replay. Whether you’re into fine-tuning your vape or just want something simple that works, this gives you both options.

Fast Charging and Long Battery Life

The built-in 1300mAh battery keeps the Xlim DNA running all day. When you need to recharge, USB-C fast charging gets you back to full in no time - no waiting around.

Pod Compatibility

The Xlim Pro 2 DNA works with all existing OXVA Xlim Pods, including V2, V3, EZ, and the new SS Top-Fill pods. That means you’ve got full flexibility across resistances, fill methods, and airflow styles.

Xlim Pro 2 Colours

Available in five standout colours, including a limited edition Luminous Forged Carbon, which changes in different lighting and glows in the dark. It’s one of the best-looking kits OXVA has ever made.

products.title: OXVA NeXlim Pod Vape Kit
products.body_html:
OXVA NeXlim Pod Kit

The OXVA NeXlim represents the evolution of the award-winning Xlim series, combining familiar ergonomics with upgraded performance. This nexlim vape delivers 40W maximum output through dual mesh UNITECH 2.0 coils, while the 1500mAh battery outlasts the original Xlim by 600mAh. The OXVA NeXlim pod kit features an 0.85-inch colour display with three customizable UI themes, making it OXVA's most advanced pod system yet.

Compatible with OXVA NeXlim pods featuring a 5-layer leak-proof structure, each pod holds 2ml and works with both freebase and nic salt e-liquids. The integrated coils use dual mesh technology - two heating elements fire simultaneously for richer flavour and extended lifespan. The OXVA NeXlim comes in 18 colour options from classic Pearl Pink to tactical Terrain Black.

OXVA NeXlim Features

  • 1500mAh Built-In Battery - 5V/2A USB-C turbo charging
  • Dual Mesh UNITECH 2.0 Technology
  • Compatible with OXVA NeXlim pods (0.6Ω, 0.8Ω, 1.2Ω)
  • 0.85" Colour Display with 3 UI themes
  • 5-Layer leak-proof pod structure
  • Boost Mode & Eco Mode functionality
  • 5-40W adjustable output range
  • Side adjustable airflow control (AFC)
  • Zinc alloy & PCTG construction
  • 18 colour finishes available

products.title: Oxva Xlim Go Vape Kit
products.body_html:
The OXVA Xlim Go is a compact refillable pod kit that keeps disposable-style ease while adding better flavour and lower running costs. A 1000mAh built-in battery provides automatic output up to 30W and charges quickly via USB-C. Inhale activation keeps it simple, and a side airflow slider lets you choose a tighter MTL draw or a looser RDTL inhale.

Fill the 2ml top-fill pod with a 50/50 or nicotine salt e-liquid, connect the pod, then wait a few minutes so the coil can soak before your first puff. The device works with Xlim V3 top-fill pods, Xlim V2 side-fill pods and OXVA prefilled pods, so you can pick the resistance and refill style you prefer. Supplied with the kit is a 0.8Ω Xlim V3 pod, which works best with 50/50 or nic salt e-liquids for a smooth, discreet vape.

products.title: Oxva Xlim Pro Pod Kit
products.body_html:
The OXVA Xlim Pro Pod Vape Kit is the upgraded choice from the OXVA Xlim Vape Series for vapers who want to take their vaping experience to the next level. Its compact build and ergonomic design make it easy to carry wherever you go. Thanks to the 900mAh battery that lasts all day, you can enjoy vaping anytime, even when used at the 25W maximum power output. The kit has two OXVA Xlim refillable pods for MTL (Mouth To Lung) vaping. One has a 0.8 Ohm vape coil, and the other has a 0.6 Ohm coil, so you can find which works best for you.

The OXVA Xlim Pro is sleek, stylish, and highly portable. You can easily slip it into your pocket or bag and take it anywhere. And with Type-C USB charging, the device can be recharged in super-fast time. With many new features including a 0.42-inch OLED Display, this Xlim Vape promises an explosive vaping experience.

products.title: Lost Mary BM6000 Refill Pods Pack of 5
products.body_html: Lost Mary BM6000 vape pods are designed for the Lost Mary BM6000 pod kit. You'll find them in one of the widest flavour ranges, inspired by Lost Mary disposable vapes. Stock up on your favourites or pick several blends and try something new for less with our multi-buys. Spend more than £200 and you'll also get free delivery.

products.title: Lostmary 600 Prefilled Pods Pack of 5
products.body_html:
Lost Mary BM600 Prefilled Pods

The Lost Mary BM600 prefilled pods are made for the  Lost Mary BM600 pod kit. Each pack gives you two pods, with up to 600 puffs per pod. That’s 1200 puffs per pack, with no refilling or mess.

Each pod contains 2ml of 20mg nicotine salt e-liquid. The built-in 1.2Ω mesh coil gives a smooth mouth-to-lung vape with steady flavour. You get the same strong taste you’d expect from Lost Mary disposable vapes, but in a more cost-friendly pod system.

Choose from 30 Lost Mary flavours, from fruit blends like blue razz ice, triple mango, strawberry ice and pink lemonade to menthol and tobacco options. These Lost Mary BM600 refill pods make it simple to swap flavours and keep your vape kit ready at all times.

products.title: OXVA Slim Stick Prefilled Cartridge
products.body_html:
Replacement prefilled cartridges for use with the Oxva SlimStick prefilled cartridge kit.

The slim, cigarette-like cartridges are prefilled for convenience with 2 ml of Oxva's 20 mg (2%) nicotine strength nic salt flavours, delivering a smooth mouth-to-lung (MTL) vaping experience.

products.title: OXVA Slim Stick Prefilled Pod Kit Pack of 5
products.body_html:
Oxva's SlimStick device provides discreet slimline cig-like vaping from its feather-light, all-metal body and built-in 1500 mAh battery featuring vibration and light alerts.

The SlimStick cigarette-like cartridges are prefilled for convenience with 2 ml of Oxva's 20 mg (2%) nicotine strength nic salt flavours, delivering a smooth mouth-to-lung (MTL) vaping experience.

  • 2ml + 10ml e-liquids

  • LED display screen and battery level indicator with Type-C charging port

Say hello to the Smart Max from IVG. The next step in the evolution of vape kits is here, its clever and innovative design ensures it's here for the long haul. With replaceable 2ml and 10ml refill pods for a huge 10,000 puffs and the new "Boost Mode" which delivers extra intensity from the standard Eco Mode. More About The IVG Smart Max Pod Kit:

IVG Smart Max vape kits come in a wide range of exciting flavours, which include: Banana Ice, Blue Raspberry Ice, Blue Razz Lemonade, Blue Sour Raspberry, Blueberry Raspberry, Classic Menthol, Cola, Fizzy Cherry, Frozen Cherry, Frozen Watermelon, Grape, Green Apple, Lemon and Lime, Pineapple Ice, Polar Mint, Retro Orange, Strawberry Raspberry Cherry, Triple Mango, Tropical Fruits and Watermelon Strawberry. For a convenient and user-friendly pod kit device that offers great performance, the IVG Smart Max can't be overlooked!

Simple To Use:

  • Simple Set Up: Remove the RED rubber stoppers from the 2ml pod.
  • Twist and remove the RED safety cap from the 10ml refill.
  • Insert 2ml pod into the 10ml refill, press firmly until they click together.
  • Insert the connected pod and refill into the device.

products.title: IVG SAVR Banana Ice Refill
products.body_html:
IVG SAVR Banana Ice Refill Pack

Featuring a 2ml prefilled pod and 4ml refill container, these pods can deliver up to 3000 puffs before needing to be replaced with a range of 30 amazing flavours. The IVG SAVR pre-filled 2ml + 4ml pods are designed only for use with the IVG SAVR and will not fit any other IVG device.

IVG SAVR Refills Features:

  • 2ml Prefilled Pod
  • 4ml Refill Container
  • 20mg Nicotine Strength
  • Up To 3000 Puffs
  • Built-In Mesh Coil
  • Available in 30 Amazing Flavours

What's In The Box:

  • 2ml IVG SAVR Prefilled Pod
  • 4ml IVG SAVR Refill Container
  • User Manual

How To Set Up Your IVG SAVR Refills:

Watch our "How To Set Up Your IVG SAVR and Install Refills" video. Or read below:

  • Remove cap from the mouthpiece by pressing and pulling downwards, then remove the silicon stopper.
  • Remove sticker and rubber stops. Align the refill and tank and press together.
  • Press until you hear a click. Ensure that the pod and tank are locked firmly together.
  • Slide both the pod and the refill container into the device battery.
  • Your IVG SAVR is now ready to use..

** Please note: IVG SAVR Refills will only fit IVG SAVR Devices **

Important Information:

  • Please note puff counts are approximate and an average of normal use, longer draws will of course lower the puff counts.
  • Note that the included IVG SAVR refills are 2 ml + 4ml 6ml (20mg) in capacity, this is the size required by the Tobacco Products Directive (TPD) and is compliant with current UK regulations.
  • This product contains nicotine which is a highly addictive substance.
  • This product is intended for people over the age of 18 only.
  • The SAVR device is rechargeable and contains a 650 mAh battery and requires a Type C charging cable to recharge (cable not included).

Featuring a 2ml prefilled pod and 4ml refill container, these pods can deliver up to 3000 puffs before needing to be replaced with a range of 30 amazing flavours. The IVG SAVR pre-filled 2ml + 4ml pods are designed only for use with the IVG SAVR and will not fit any other IVG device.

IVG SAVR Refills Features:

  • 2ml Prefilled Pod
  • 4ml Refill Container
  • 20mg Nicotine Strength
  • Up To 3000 Puffs
  • Built-In Mesh Coil
  • Available in 30 Amazing Flavours

What's In The Box:

  • 2ml IVG SAVR Prefilled Pod
  • 4ml IVG SAVR Refill Container
  • User Manual

How To Set Up Your IVG SAVR Refills:

Watch our "How To Set Up Your IVG SAVR and Install Refills" video. Or read below:

  • Remove cap from the mouthpiece by pressing and pulling downwards, then remove the silicon stopper.
  • Remove sticker and rubber stops. Align the refill and tank and press together.
  • Press until you hear a click. Ensure that the pod and tank are locked firmly together.
  • Slide both the pod and the refill container into the device battery.
  • Your IVG SAVR is now ready to use..

** Please note: IVG SAVR Refills will only fit IVG SAVR Devices **

Important Information:

  • Please note puff counts are approximate and an average of normal use, longer draws will of course lower the puff counts.
  • Note that the included IVG SAVR refills are 2 ml + 4ml 6ml (20mg) in capacity, this is the size required by the Tobacco Products Directive (TPD) and is compliant with current UK regulations.
  • This product contains nicotine which is a highly addictive substance.
  • This product is intended for people over the age of 18 only.
  • The SAVR device is rechargeable and contains a 650 mAh battery and requires a Type C charging cable to recharge (cable not included).

Available in 55 amazing IVG flavours: Reload Pods 4 in 1 Pack in 45 flavours and Reload 2 Pack, 10 flavours.

How To Reload Your IVG 2400 4 In 1 Rechargeable Device

  • Remove the pods from the packaging.
  • Remove the cap, detach the mouthpiece from the top of the device.

Important Instructions:

  • This product is intended for people over the age of 18 only.
  • **IVG 2400 Reload Pods are only compatible with the IVG 2400 Rechargeable Device**

products.title: IVG Reload Mini Watermelon Ice Starter Kit
products.body_html:
IVG Reload Watermelon Ice Mini Vape Kit – Compact Rechargeable Pod Device

Enjoy a crisp watermelon with a chilled exhale.

The IVG Reload Mini Starter Kit is a compact, prefilled vaping device for adult smokers. Lightweight and easy to use, it comes with a 2ml pod ready to vape and is designed for mouth-to-lung (MTL) use.

Compatible with IVG 2400 4-in-1 Reload Pods in 2-pack (1,200 puffs) or 4-pack (2,400 puffs) formats, it offers 55 flavour editions with 20mg nicotine salt per pod. The internal battery with USB-C fast charging ensures reliable use, while the reusable pod system provides extra flavours and can reduce waste compared with disposables.

What’s Included in the IVG Reload Mini Starter Kit

  • 1 x IVG Reload Mini Device
  • 1 x Prefilled 2ml Pod (20mg nicotine)
  • User Manual

Key Features & Benefits

  • Prefilled 2ml Pod – ready to use out of the box with 20mg nicotine salt.
  • Up to 600 Puffs per Pod – no refilling required.
  • 2-pack = 1,200 puffs / 4-pack = 2,400 puffs – value and convenience.
  • 55 Flavour Editions – choose from a range of IVG flavours.
  • Compact & Lightweight – discreet, pocket-sized design.
  • Reliable MTL Vaping – provides a mouth-to-lung experience similar to traditional cigarettes.
  • USB-C Fast Charging – quick power-up for all-day use (cable not included).
  • Reusable Pod System – replace the pod when empty.
  • Fully TPD/TRPR Compliant – legal for sale in the UK.

How the Pod System Works

  1. Remove the device and pod from its packaging, removing any stickers and rubber stoppers.
  2. Remove the mouthpiece from the device and slide the pod into it.
  3. Click the mouthpiece back into place and ensure the flavour is displayed above the device logo under the mouthpiece.

Only compatible with 2400 Reload Pods.

IVG Reload Mini Flavours (Device Only*)

Choose from a range of IVG flavours, including Cherry Ice, Tropical Fruits, Fizzy Cherry, Pro Blue, Blue Razz Lemonade, Pink Lemonade, Blue Raspberry Ice, Kiwi Passionfruit Guava, Blue Razz Cherry, Red Apple Ice, Sour Blueberry Raspberry, Raspberry, Lemon & Lime, Pineapple Ice, Classic Menthol, Strawberry Watermelon, Strawberry Raspberry Ice, Strawberry Ice, Watermelon Ice, Red Sour Raspberry and Grape Ice.

FAQs – IVG Reload Mini Starter Kit

Q: What pods does the IVG Reload Mini use?
A: The Reload Mini is only compatible with IVG 2400 4-in-1 Reload Pods, available in 2-pack and 4-pack formats with a total of 55 flavour editions.
Q: How many puffs do I get per pod?
A: Each pod delivers up to 600 puffs. A 2-pack gives 1,200 puffs, and a 4-pack gives 2,400 puffs in total.
Q: Does the Reload Mini Starter Kit include a pod?
A: Yes, the kit comes with 1 x 2ml prefilled pod (20mg nicotine salt) so you can start vaping straight away.
Q: Is the Reload Mini rechargeable?
A: Yes. The device has a built-in 500 mAh battery and USB-C fast charging (cable not included).
Q: Is this device suitable for beginners?
A: Yes. The Reload Mini is designed for adult smokers seeking a mouth-to-lung (MTL) vaping option with a prefilled pod system.
Q: How does it compare to disposables?
A: The Reload Mini offers the same convenience as disposables but with better value, more flavours, and less waste. Simply swap the pod when it’s empty.
Q: Is it compliant for UK sale?
A: Yes. The Reload Mini and Reload Pods are fully TPD/TRPR compliant and legal for sale in the UK.

Important Information

  • Contains nicotine (20mg), a highly addictive substance.
  • For adult use only (18+). Not suitable for non-smokers, minors, or pregnant women.
  • Keep out of reach of children and pets.
  • Puff counts are approximate and depend on usage.
  • Free delivery if you spend over £30 (excluding NI).

Enjoy classic strawberry with a refreshing ice twist.

The IVG Reload Mini Starter Kit is a compact, prefilled vaping device for adult smokers. Lightweight and easy to use, it comes with a 2ml pod ready to vape and is designed for mouth-to-lung (MTL) use.

Compatible with IVG 2400 4-in-1 Reload Pods in 2-pack (1,200 puffs) or 4-pack (2,400 puffs) formats, it offers 55 flavour editions with 20mg nicotine salt per pod. The internal battery with USB-C fast charging ensures reliable use, while the reusable pod system provides extra flavours and can reduce waste compared with disposables.

What’s Included in the IVG Reload Mini Starter Kit

  • 1 x IVG Reload Mini Device
  • 1 x Prefilled 2ml Pod (20mg nicotine)
  • User Manual

Key Features & Benefits

  • Prefilled 2ml Pod – ready to use out of the box with 20mg nicotine salt.
  • Up to 600 Puffs per Pod – no refilling required.
  • 2-pack = 1,200 puffs / 4-pack = 2,400 puffs – value and convenience.
  • 55 Flavour Editions – choose from a range of IVG flavours.
  • Compact & Lightweight – discreet, pocket-sized design.
  • Reliable MTL Vaping – provides a mouth-to-lung experience similar to traditional cigarettes.
  • USB-C Fast Charging – quick power-up for all-day use (cable not included).
  • Reusable Pod System – replace the pod when empty.
  • Fully TPD/TRPR Compliant – legal for sale in the UK.

How the Pod System Works

  1. Remove the device and pod from its packaging, removing any stickers and rubber stoppers.
  2. Remove the mouthpiece from the device and slide the pod into it.
  3. Click the mouthpiece back into place and ensure the flavour is displayed above the device logo under the mouthpiece.

IVG Reload Mini Flavours (Device Only*)

Choose from a range of IVG flavours, including Cherry Ice, Tropical Fruits, Fizzy Cherry, Pro Blue, Blue Razz Lemonade, Pink Lemonade, Blue Raspberry Ice, Kiwi Passionfruit Guava, Blue Razz Cherry, Red Apple Ice, Sour Blueberry Raspberry, Raspberry, Lemon & Lime, Pineapple Ice, Classic Menthol, Strawberry Watermelon, Strawberry Raspberry Ice, Strawberry Ice, Watermelon Ice, Red Sour Raspberry and Grape Ice.

FAQs – IVG Reload Mini Starter Kit

Q: What pods does the IVG Reload Mini use?
A: The Reload Mini is only compatible with IVG 2400 4-in-1 Reload Pods, available in 2-pack and 4-pack formats with a total of 55 flavour editions.
Q: How many puffs do I get per pod?
A: Each pod delivers up to 600 puffs. A 2-pack gives 1,200 puffs, and a 4-pack gives 2,400 puffs in total.
Q: Does the Reload Mini Starter Kit include a pod?
A: Yes, the kit comes with 1 x 2ml prefilled pod (20mg nicotine salt) so you can start vaping straight away.
Q: Is the Reload Mini rechargeable?
A: Yes. The device has a built-in 500 mAh battery and USB-C fast charging (cable not included).
Q: Is this device suitable for beginners?
A: Yes. The Reload Mini is designed for adult smokers seeking a mouth-to-lung (MTL) vaping option with a prefilled pod system.
Q: How does it compare to disposables?
A: The Reload Mini offers the same convenience as disposables but with better value, more flavours, and less waste. Simply swap the pod when it’s empty.
Q: Is it compliant for UK sale?
A: Yes. The Reload Mini and Reload Pods are fully TPD/TRPR compliant and legal for sale in the UK.

Important Information

  • Contains nicotine (20mg), a highly addictive substance.
  • For adult use only (18+). Not suitable for non-smokers, minors, or pregnant women.
  • Keep out of reach of children and pets.
  • Puff counts are approximate and depend on usage.
  • Free delivery if you spend over £30 (excluding NI).

products.body_html:
IVG Reload Lemon & Lime Mini Vape Kit – Compact Rechargeable Pod Device

Enjoy a sharp, citrusy lemon and lime with a clean finish.

The IVG Reload Mini Starter Kit is a compact, prefilled vaping device for adult smokers. Lightweight and easy to use, it comes with a 2ml pod ready to vape and is designed for mouth-to-lung (MTL) use.

Compatible with IVG 2400 4-in-1 Reload Pods in 2-pack (1,200 puffs) or 4-pack (2,400 puffs) formats, it offers 55 flavour editions with 20mg nicotine salt per pod. The internal battery with USB-C fast charging ensures reliable use, while the reusable pod system provides extra flavours and can reduce waste compared with disposables.

What’s Included in the IVG Reload Mini Starter Kit

  • 1 x IVG Reload Mini Device
  • 1 x Prefilled 2ml Pod (20mg nicotine)
  • User Manual

Key Features & Benefits

  • Prefilled 2ml Pod – ready to use out of the box with 20mg nicotine salt.
  • Up to 600 Puffs per Pod – no refilling required.
  • 2-pack = 1,200 puffs / 4-pack = 2,400 puffs – value and convenience.
  • 55 Flavour Editions – choose from a range of IVG flavours.
  • Compact & Lightweight – discreet, pocket-sized design.
  • Reliable MTL Vaping – provides a mouth-to-lung experience similar to traditional cigarettes.
  • USB-C Fast Charging – quick power-up for all-day use (cable not included).
  • Reusable Pod System – replace the pod when empty.
  • Fully TPD/TRPR Compliant – legal for sale in the UK.

How the Pod System Works

  1. Remove the device and pod from its packaging, removing any stickers and rubber stoppers.
  2. Remove the mouthpiece from the device and slide the pod into it.
  3. Click the mouthpiece back into place and ensure the flavour is displayed above the device logo under the mouthpiece.

Only compatible with 2400 Reload Pods.

IVG Reload Mini Flavours (Device Only*)

Choose from a range of IVG flavours, including Cherry Ice, Tropical Fruits, Fizzy Cherry, Pro Blue, Blue Razz Lemonade, Pink Lemonade, Blue Raspberry Ice, Kiwi Passionfruit Guava, Blue Razz Cherry, Red Apple Ice, Sour Blueberry Raspberry, Raspberry, Lemon & Lime, Pineapple Ice, Classic Menthol, Strawberry Watermelon, Strawberry Raspberry Ice, Strawberry Ice, Watermelon Ice, Red Sour Raspberry and Grape Ice.

*See IVG 2400 Reload Pods for full-flavour editions.

FAQs – IVG Reload Mini Starter Kit

Q: What pods does the IVG Reload Mini use?
A: The Reload Mini is only compatible with IVG 2400 4-in-1 Reload Pods, available in 2-pack and 4-pack formats with a total of 55 flavour editions.
Q: How many puffs do I get per pod?
A: Each pod delivers up to 600 puffs. A 2-pack gives 1,200 puffs, and a 4-pack gives 2,400 puffs in total.
Q: Does the Reload Mini Starter Kit include a pod?
A: Yes, the kit comes with 1 x 2ml prefilled pod (20mg nicotine salt) so you can start vaping straight away.
Q: Is the Reload Mini rechargeable?
A: Yes. The device has a built-in 500 mAh battery and USB-C fast charging (cable not included).
Q: Is this device suitable for beginners?
A: Yes. The Reload Mini is designed for adult smokers seeking a mouth-to-lung (MTL) vaping option with a prefilled pod system.
Q: How does it compare to disposables?
A: The Reload Mini offers the same convenience as disposables but with better value, more flavours, and less waste. Simply swap the pod when it’s empty.
Q: Is it compliant for UK sale?
A: Yes. The Reload Mini and Reload Pods are fully TPD/TRPR compliant and legal for sale in the UK.

Important Information

  • Contains nicotine (20mg), a highly addictive substance.
  • For adult use only (18+). Not suitable for non-smokers, minors, or pregnant women.
  • Keep out of reach of children and pets.
  • Puff counts are approximate and depend on usage.
  • Free delivery if you spend over £30 (excluding NI).

Pair with Your 2400 Reload Pods

Keep your vaping experience seamless by pairing your device with IVG 2400 4-in-1 Reload Pods. Simply remove your used pod from the device and follow the instructions above to begin vaping.

products.title: IVG 2400 4 In 1 Blackberry Edition Reload Pods Pack of 5
products.body_html:
Blackberry Edition IVG 2400 4 In 1 Reload Pods

  • Blackberry Raspberry - Fresh fruity blackberry with end notes of red raspberry
  • Blackberry Blueberry - Fruity blackberry and candy blueberry
  • Blackberry Strawberry - Fresh fruity blackberry with hints of strawberry
  • Blackberry Blackcurrant - Fruity blackberry blended with blackcurrant

The IVG 2400 4 In 1 Reload Prefilled Pods

Available in 55 amazing IVG flavours: Reload Pods 4 in 1 Pack in 45 flavours and Reload 2 Pack, 10 flavours.

How To Reload Your IVG 2400 4 In 1 Rechargeable Device

  • Remove the pods from the packaging.
  • Remove the cap, detach the mouthpiece from the top of the device.
  • Prepare the pre-filled pods - Insert all four pre-filled pods into the device with the arrows facing down.
  • Lift and rotate the top of your IVG Rechargeable vape and select your flavour.

Important Instructions:

  • Please note puff counts are approximate and an average of normal use, longer draws will of course lower the puff counts.
  • Note that the pods are 4 x 2 ml in capacity, this is the size required by the Tobacco Products Directive and is compliant with current regulations.
  • This product is intended for people over the age of 18 only.
  • **IVG 2400 Reload Pods are only compatible with the IVG 2400 Rechargeable Device**

products.title: IVG XL35 Blue Raspberry Ice Starter Kit Pack of 5
products.body_html:
IVG XL35 Blue Raspberry Ice Vape Kit – 35,000 Puff Rechargeable Pod System

Big capacity. All-day performance. A crisp blue raspberry flavour with a smooth icy finish.

The XL35 is a rechargeable pod device with an aluminium finish and a huge 22ml total pod capacity in a TPD-compliant format, delivering up to 35,000 puffs. 

Powered by a 1100mAh battery and equipped with dual 1.1Ω mesh coils, it provides smooth, dense vapour and a consistent MTL experience with fewer refills.

A built-in smart display shows battery life, charging status, and allows you to toggle Boost or Eco modes for bigger clouds or extended battery life.

Contains

  • 1 x IVG XL35 Device
  • 1 x 2ml Prefilled Pod
  • 2 x 10ml Refill Containers
  • 1 x User Manual

Key Features & Benefits

  • Massive 22ml Capacity – Innovative 2+10+10ml (22ml total) pod system delivers up to 35,000 puffs with fewer refills.
  • Premium Aluminium Design – Durable, sleek and comfortable for everyday use.
  • Smart Display Screen – Shows battery %, charging status, and Boost/Eco mode at a glance.
  • 18W Power Output – Smooth, flavour-rich mouth-to-lung (MTL) performance designed for ex-smokers and vapers alike.
  • Dual 1.1Ω Mesh Coils – Consistent dense vapour and bold, clean flavour every time.
  • Boost & Eco Modes – Choose bigger clouds and bolder flavour with Boost, or longer battery life with Eco.
  • 1100mAh Rechargeable Battery – All-day power with fast USB-C charging.
  • Nicotine Options – Available 20mg strengths across 15 flavour profiles.
  • Fully UK TPD-Compliant – Legal and safe for sale in the UK.

How the Pod System Works

Each IVG XL35 refill includes a 2ml pod and two 10ml refill containers (22ml total capacity). The auto-fill mechanism eliminates mess and prevents constant pod changing:

  1. Remove the 2ml base pod and two 10 ml refill pods from the packaging, ensuring all parts remain intact.
  2. Hold both 10ml refill pods side by side (they fit as a pair) and align them with the top of the 2ml base.
  3. Slide the paired refill pods downward onto the 2ml base pod until they click into place.
  4. Once the pod is assembled, insert it into the main body of the device until it locks into place.

The built-in dual mesh coils ensure bold flavour with every puff. Only compatible with XL35 Refill Pods.

Flavours, Strengths & Devices to Explore

  • XL35 Flavours 20mg: Blue Raspberry Ice, Blue Sour Raspberry, Cherry Peach Lemon, Classic Menthol, Fizzy Cherry, Green Apple, Guava Pineapple Passionfruit, Lemon Lime, Peach Ice, Pineapple Ice, Pink Lemonade, Retro Grape, Strawberry Ice, Strawberry Raspberry Cherry, and Watermelon Strawberry.
  • XL35 Device Colours: Yellow, Purple, Green, Red, Blue, Teal, Pink.

Looking for Refills?

Pair this kit with a Blue Raspberry Ice Refill Pod to keep your setup ready. Each pack includes a 2ml pod and two 10ml refill containers (22ml total capacity), perfectly matched to this device.

FAQs

How long does the IVG XL35 device last?

The XL35 is a reusable, long-lasting vape kit. With proper care, all you need to do is recharge the battery and replace the refill pods as needed.

Is the IVG XL35 refillable?

Yes, but without the mess of pouring liquid. Each XL35 refill pack includes a 2ml pod and two 10ml refill containers (22ml total capacity). The auto-fill system transfers the liquid into the 2ml pod when clicked together. Once empty, replace with a new refill pod pack.

How many puffs can I get from one refill?

Each XL35 refill pod system delivers up to 35,000 puffs in total. Puff count may vary depending on usage.

Is the device rechargeable?

Yes. The XL35 has a built-in 1100mAh battery that charges via USB-C (cable not included), offering fast and reliable power.

What are Boost and Eco Modes?

Boost mode delivers bigger clouds and more intense flavour, while Eco mode extends battery life for longer vaping sessions.

Is the XL35 suitable for beginners or ex-smokers?

Yes. The XL35 is designed for adult smokers looking for a convenient, cigarette-style vape. Its smooth mouth-to-lung (MTL) draw and 20mg nicotine salt can make switching easier.

Is this device compliant with UK law?

Yes. The IVG XL35 is fully TPD/TRPR compliant and legal for sale in the UK.

Can I buy refills separately?

Absolutely. IVG XL35 refill pods are sold separately in 15 flavours. Each refill pack includes a 2ml pod and two 10ml refill containers (22ml total capacity), designed exclusively for the XL35 system.

Important Information

  • Puff count is approximate and may vary based on usage.
  • Each refill contains a 2ml pod and two 10ml refill containers (22ml total capacity).
  • The device is reusable with replaceable prefilled pods.
  • 18W max power output.
  • USB-C charging cable not included.
  • Contains nicotine (20mg), a highly addictive substance.
  • For adults 18+ only. Not for use by non-smokers, minors, or pregnant women.
  • Free delivery if you spend over £30 (excluding NI).

Pair with Your XL35 Refills

Keep your vaping experience seamless by pairing your device with IVG XL35 Refill Pods. Attach the pods to the base pod, and slide the pod into your device for smooth, consistent vapour every time.

Make every puff count → See which IVG vape gives you the best value for money.

Keep your IVG XL35 device ready with our Green Apple refill pods. Crisp green apple with a tart, fresh flavour.

Each refill pack includes a 2ml base pod and two 10ml refill containers (22ml total capacity) delivering up to 35,000 puffs. The mess-free auto-fill system transfers liquid directly into the pod when clicked together, so you can vape without constant pod swapping.

Contains

  • 1 x 2ml Prefilled Pod
  • 2 x 10ml Refill Containers
  • 1 User Manual

*Pod connects to refill containers to create one pod.

Key Features

  • Mess-Free Auto-Fill – Simple click-to-fill system prevents spills and leaks.
  • Up to 35,000 Puffs – Large capacity with fewer refills.
  • Replaceable Pods – Swap pods easily, keep reusing your XL35 device.
  • MTL Vaping Experience – Smooth, cigarette-style draw ideal for adult smokers.
  • Advanced Dual 1.1Ω Mesh Coils – Consistent vapour and clean, bold flavour.
  • Nicotine Options – Available in 20mg nicotine strength.
  • Fully UK TPD-Compliant – Safe and legal for sale in the UK.

How the Pod System Works

Each IVG XL35 refill pack includes a 2ml base pod and two 10ml refill containers. Together, they form a massive 22ml pod system. The auto-fill mechanism makes topping up effortless:

  1. Remove the 2ml base pod and both 10ml refill containers from the packaging.
  2. Hold the two refill containers side by side and align them with the top of the 2ml base pod.
  3. Slide them downward until they click into place; the pod auto-fills cleanly.
  4. Insert the assembled pod into your XL35 device until locked.
  5. Vape as normal; no mess, no fuss.

The built-in dual mesh coils ensure bold flavour with every puff. Only compatible with IVG XL35 devices.

Flavours & Strengths to Explore

The XL35 refill range is available in 15 flavours at 20mg nicotine, including:
Blue Raspberry Ice, Blue Sour Raspberry, Cherry Peach Lemon, Classic Menthol, Fizzy Cherry, Green Apple, Guava Pineapple Passionfruit, Lemon Lime, Peach Ice, Pineapple Ice, Pink Lemonade, Retro Grape, Strawberry Ice, Strawberry Raspberry Cherry, and Watermelon Strawberry.

FAQs

How long does one XL35 refill last?

Each refill pod system (2ml pod + 2 × 10ml containers) delivers up to 35,000 puffs, depending on usage.

Do I need to refill manually?

No. The auto-fill system transfers liquid directly into the pod when clicked together.

Can I buy refills separately?

Yes. XL35 refills are sold in all 15 flavours.

Is it beginner-friendly?

Yes. The XL35 pod system is designed for adult smokers and vapers who want a convenient, cigarette-style MTL experience.

Is it legal in the UK?

Yes. All IVG XL35 pods are fully TPD/TRPR compliant.

Important Information

  • Puff count is approximate and varies by usage.
  • Each refill contains a 2ml base pod + two 10ml refill containers (22ml total).
  • Designed exclusively for the XL35 device.
  • Contains nicotine (20mg), a highly addictive substance.
  • For adults 18+ only. Not for use by non-smokers, minors, or pregnant women.
  • Keep out of reach of children and pets.
  • Free delivery available on orders over £30 (excluding NI).

Pair with Your IVG XL35 Device

Once you have your XL35 Green Apple starter kit, these refills keep your vape fresh and ready anytime. Just click, fill, and enjoy smooth, consistent vapour.

  • Nicotine Options – Available in 20mg nicotine strength.
  • Fully UK TPD-Compliant – Safe and legal for sale in the UK.

How the Pod System Works

Each IVG XL35 refill pack includes a 2ml base pod and two 10ml refill containers. Together, they form a massive 22ml pod system. The auto-fill mechanism makes topping up effortless:

  1. Remove the 2ml base pod and both 10ml refill containers from the packaging.
  2. Hold the two refill containers side by side and align them with the top of the 2ml base pod.
  3. Slide them downward until they click into place; the pod auto-fills cleanly.
  4. Insert the assembled pod into your XL35 device until locked.
  5. Vape as normal; no mess, no fuss.

The built-in dual mesh coils ensure bold flavour with every puff. Only compatible with IVG XL35 devices.

Flavours & Strengths to Explore

The XL35 refill range is available in 15 flavours at 20mg nicotine, including:
Blue Raspberry Ice, Blue Sour Raspberry, Cherry Peach Lemon, Classic Menthol, Fizzy Cherry, Green Apple, Guava Pineapple Passionfruit, Lemon Lime, Peach Ice, Pineapple Ice, Pink Lemonade, Retro Grape, Strawberry Ice, Strawberry Raspberry Cherry, and Watermelon Strawberry.

FAQs

How long does one XL35 refill last?

Each refill pod system (2ml pod + 2 × 10ml containers) delivers up to 35,000 puffs, depending on usage.

Do I need to refill manually?

No. The auto-fill system transfers liquid directly into the pod when clicked together.

Can I buy refills separately?

Yes. XL35 refills are sold in all 15 flavours.

Is it beginner-friendly?

Yes. The XL35 pod system is designed for adult smokers and vapers who want a convenient, cigarette-style MTL experience.

Is it legal in the UK?

Yes. All IVG XL35 pods are fully TPD/TRPR compliant.

Important Information

  • Puff count is approximate and varies by usage.
  • Each refill contains a 2ml base pod + two 10ml refill containers (22ml total).
  • Designed exclusively for the XL35 device.
  • Contains nicotine (20mg), a highly addictive substance.
  • For adults 18+ only. Not for use by non-smokers, minors, or pregnant women.
  • Keep out of reach of children and pets.
  • Free delivery available on orders over £30 (excluding NI).

Pair with Your IVG XL35 Device

Once you have IVG XL35 Watermelon Strawberry Starter Kit, these refills keep your vape fresh and ready anytime. Just click, fill, and enjoy smooth, consistent vapour.

Designed for ultimate simplicity, this compact prefilled pod kit features inhale activation, USB-C recharging, and interchangeable pods with dual QUAQ mesh coils for richer flavour and fast nicotine satisfaction. If you loved the BM600 disposable, this is your seamless step into the world of rechargeable vapes - no refilling, no coil changes, just pop in a pod and puff.

OXVA Xlim SQ Pro 2 Pod Vape Kit
products.body_html:
Xlim SQ Pro 2

The XLIM SQ Pro 2 by OXVA is the first touchscreen pod kit in the popular Xlim Vape Series. The SQ Pro 2 features multiple upgrades from the original Xlim SQ Pro kit. This OXVA Vape now features an increased 1600mAh battery, 30w of power, HD touchscreen capabilities, and 64 different user interfaces to choose from. The Xlim SQ Pro 2 also includes a built-in puff tracker and six additional tools, all useful in daily life. This Xlim vape kit comes with top-filling Xlim V3 Pods but is also compatible with the entire range of OXVA Xlim Pods too. This OXVA kit boasts the highest interactivity and usability ever released!

Xlim SQ Pro 2 Features

  • 1600mAh Built-in Battery (USB-C)
  • Up to 30W Power Output
  • Top-fill Refillable Pod
  • MTL & RDL Vaping Styles
  • 1.09” Touchscreen
  • Intelligent Puff Tracker
  • Eco Power Mode
  • Adjustable Airflow Control
  • Supports Nic Salts & Freebase E-liquids
  • Compatible with OXVA Xlim Pods

Battery & Adjustable Power

OXVA Xlim SQ Pro 2 has a 30W adjustable power output and an upgraded 1600mAh built-in battery that lasts, with Eco mode also helping to extend Xlim SQ Pro 2’s battery life up to 7 days on a single charge. The Xlim SQ Pro 2 offers 33% more battery capacity than the original, so you never need to worry about losing charge again!

products.title: OXVA Xlim PRO 2 Pod Vape Kit
products.body_html:
OXVA Xlim Pro 2 Pod Kit

The Xlim Pro 2 is a lightweight pod kit designed by OXVA, as part of the popular Xlim Vape Series.

With up to 30W of power and a 1300mAh built-in battery, the OXVA Xlim Pro 2 can last up to four days on a single charge, and can recharge in just 25 minutes with fast USB-C charging.

It’s compatible with the Xlim V2 and Xlim EZ Pods, so whichever pods you go for, this OXVA Vape can support your vaping style and works best with nic salts and 50/50 E-liquids. 

OXVA Xlim Pro 2 Features

  • 1300mAh Long-Lasting Battery
  • 25-Minute Recharge Time
  • Multi-Pod Compatibility
  • Streamlined One-Button Operation
  • 30w Maximum Output
  • 0.56” Ultra-HD Display

1300mAh Long-Lasting Battery

The OXVA Xlim Pro 2 boasts a powerful 1300mAh battery that lasts for up to four days on just a single charge. When recharging, the USB-C fast-charging system powers the device fully in under 30 minutes, ensuring minimal downtime.

products.title: OXVA VPrime Pod Vape Kit
products.body_html:
OXVA VPrime Pod Kit

OXVA’s VPrime Pod Kit is the world’s first auto-draw DTL pod kit. With a 60W power output and 2600mAh rechargeable built-in battery, this OXVA vape is perfect for uninterrupted, all-day vaping. OXVA pods support DTL, RDL and MTL vaping, so you can adjust your OXVA VPrime to match your style with the compatible OXVA VPrime Pod.

This means that the OXVA VPrime Vape Kit works great with nic salts and shortfill E-liquids, and its advanced Unitech 2.0 coil technology delivers up to 50% more flavour!

OXVA VPrime Features

  • Inhale Activation
  • 60W Power Output
  • 2600mAh Built-In Battery
  • Unitech 2.0 Coil
  • DTL, RDL & MTL Vaping Styles
  • Supports Nic Salts & Shortfill E-liquids
  • 0.96-Inch Coloured Display
  • Adjustable Airflow Control
  • Compatible with OXVA VPrime Pods

OXVA VPrime Pod Resistance & Power

  • 0.2Ω - DTL (45-60w)
  • 0.4Ω - RDTL (28-38w)
  • 0.6Ω - RDTL (20-25w)
  • 0.8Ω - MTL (14-18w)

Auto-Draw Technology

The OXVA VPrime Vape is the first pod kit to introduce auto-drawing technology for Direct To Lung (DTL) vaping, eliminating the need to press a button for every draw.

products.title: Oxva NeXlim GO Pod Kit
products.body_html:
OXVA NeXlim Go is the next best thing in the ever-evolving Xlim Series. OXVA have done it again with this new NeXlim device, this time streamlined without a screen or any added fuss. The NeXlim Go packs a huge 1800mAh internal battery, automatic power adjustment depending on pod resistance, and a simple LED battery light to keep an eye on your charge. It still takes the same NeXlim Pods as the original, but adds two smart modes - eco or boost - controlled by a single side toggle switch. The NeXlim Go is a top refillable pod kit for nic salts or 50/50 e-liquid, making it an easy winner among starter vape kits.

Key Features

  • Dual Mesh Technology
  • Boost & Eco Modes
  • 2ml Built-In Pod
  • 1800 mAh fast-charging
  • 2ml capacity NeXlim cartridge
  • Ergonomic AFC
  • Instant 0.01s Auto-draw activation
  • 40W Max power output

Battery and Power Modes

The NeXlim Go’s 1800mAh built-in battery gives you dependable, all-day vaping power. Recharge is handled quickly via USB-C, and with two modes to choose from - eco or boost - you can adjust the output to suit your mood with just a flick of the toggle switch.

Smart Auto-Power and Coil Tech

Thanks to automatic power adjustment, the NeXlim Go sets its power based on the pod’s resistance, so there’s no need to mess about with manual settings. Paired with Unitech 2.0 dual mesh coil technology inside the NeXlim Pods, you get consistently strong flavour and long-lasting coil performance whether you vape nic salts or 50/50 juices.

products.title: Oxva Xlim Go 2 Pod Kit
products.body_html:
The Oxva Xlim Go 2 is an easy-to-use refillable pod device with a vast, high-density 1500 mAh fast-charging 2A battery that provides up to 30W of power. Features include ergonomic airflow control, a unique starry glow lighting effect and a three-colour battery level indicator.

Oxva's Xlim Go 2 pod kit includes a 0.8Ω Xlim V3 top-filling pod cartridge, designed with a leak-resistant 2ml e-liquid chamber and a top-filling port for hassle-free refilling operations. 

Key Features

  • Dynamic 30W max output power
  • 1500 mAh built-in battery supporting fast-charging Type-C
  • Ergonomic AFC (airflow control)
  • Breathing starry light battery indicator

Huge battery

Oxva Xlim's Go 2 pod kit is powered by a massive 1500mAh built-in battery with 2A fast-charging technology, which charges the battery to 80% in 30 minutes. This high-density battery provides long-lasting flavour for up to five days of use using the supplied 0.8Ω Xlim top-filling V3 pod.

Tight or loose, consistently smooth!

If you're a hardened vaper, you will know airflow is everything to control the overall style of vaping experience.

Oxva Xlim's Go 2 has a simple airflow adjuster slider located on the side. 

Close off the airflow for a tight MTL draw, or open it up for a loose, less-restricted vape.
